alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:43PM CDT until May 09 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HARPER AND WESTERN KINGMAN COUNTIES... At 843 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Cunningham to 8 miles east of Nashville, moving east to southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Cunningham, Nashville, Willowdale, Zenda, Spivey, Cleveland and Crystal Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
